markdown.markdown: ```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE} library(readr) library(quarto) ``` ```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='hide'} papers_csv <- read_csv("papers.csv") prev_year <- "" for (i in seq_len(nrow(papers_csv))) { year <- substr(papers_csv$year[i], 1, 4) if (year != prev_year) { cat("## ", year, "\n\n") prev_year <- year } cat(paste0("[","`r papers_csv$title[", i, "]`", "]" , "(`r papers_csv$url[", i, "]`)")) if (!is.na(papers_csv$open[i]) && papers_csv$open[i] != "") { cat(paste0(" [Open access]" , "(`r papers_csv$open[", i, "]`)")) } cat("\n\n") } ``` [`r papers_csv$title[1]`](`r papers_csv$url[1]`) ## 2022 [`r papers_csv$title[2]`](`r papers_csv$url[2]`) [`r papers_csv$title[3]`](`r papers_csv$url[3]`) [Open access](`r papers_csv$open[3]`) [`r papers_csv$title[4]`](`r papers_csv$url[4]`) [`r papers_csv$title[5]`](`r papers_csv$url[5]`) ## 2021 [`r papers_csv$title[6]`](`r papers_csv$url[6]`) [`r papers_csv$title[7]`](`r papers_csv$url[7]`)
